name: AnShi
description:
AnShi is a 3rd person sci-fi movie length, relaxing and emotional fantasy adventure set on an alien planet uncovering what happened to the world and their beings.

Story


AnShi is telling the story about an alien creature which crashed on an alien planet somewhere in the universe. You lost your memory during the crash and supervised by the elders you start to discover the planet and its history. Soon you will realize that there is more than you thought. As you progress through the world you find a small energy ball, a singularity. With the help of the elders you will learn about your past and the planet and you will realize that something really bad happened...

Features


  • Relaxing 3rd person sci-fi adventure
  • AnShi features up to 3 hours of playtime depending on your play style
  • Follow the story through 7 unique zones
  • Experience a unqiue story
  • Inspired by games like "Abzu" and "Journey"

For whom is AnShi developed?


AnShi is a relaxing game and in its philosophy build as a game for one evening like watching a TV movie. It features easy puzzles and focus on the experience to unveil the story.

Information


AnShi is an indie game which was made by one game developer and a composer. It took 2 years of spare time development to create the game experience. We tried to create the best experience possible and to bring this unique game to you.

Thank you all for playing the game. It really means the world to us!

  • Andre Schaaf-Ledermüller (design, development, everything...)
  • Devel Sullivan (composer, music)
